### <font color="darkred">NEWS</font>
##### 2025-07-02
Our research proposal for General Research Fund (GRF) has been approved. We secured HKD1.2M for the next three years and the sedimentary eDNA project will start on 1 September 2025.

##### 2025-03-20
We posted our new preprint in _bioRxiv_ ([here](https://doi.org/10.1101/2025.03.19.644246))! This is our first "Hong Kong" paper!
